de.gidoo.owl
Class UnicodeHelpers

java.lang.Object
  de.gidoo.owl.UnicodeHelpers

public class UnicodeHelpers
extends java.lang.Object

Provides some functions to handle Unicode and masked characters.

Author:
Thomas Krause

Field Detail

pow16

static long[] pow16
Various powers with 16 as base and the index as power. I absolutly don't take any warranty that everything is correct and I don't worry about this since longToHexString() is not used (I found out too late that the Java-libs already contain such a function).
